website_summaries.verdict: The Canon EF-S 18-55mm IS kit lens is a solidly performing medium-zoom lens, with good optics and image stabilization, that will appeal to more than just the entry-level crowd.
pros: Optical image stabilization delivers sharper handheld photos at slow shutter speeds
cons: plastic construction less desirable than metal
55mm maximum focal length may leave you short

customer_reviews.title: Canon len
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! So glad I was able to find it as a replacement for my other one that was broke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lens to replace the one that we had. Great bargain for the price.

customer_reviews.title: I saw such a new item
customer_reviews.text: It's just a manufacturer's box in a cardboard box. There is no manual. I don't even know if it's new or not in a plastic bag. This is a bulk item. Is it a fraud?

customer_reviews.title: High Level of Excellence
customer_reviews.text: The lens was delivered quickly and well packaged. We immediately tried it with our camera and have taken some lovely pictures. As always, Cannon has maintained their high level of excellence.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine!
customer_reviews.text: Works just like the previous lens I had for the camera before the old one got damaged.

customer_reviews.title: canon ef-s 18-55 f/3.5-5.6 IS auto focus lens
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good lens I have had no problem so far I would recommend this lens for anyone needing close sharp picture's also takes great micro and add a wide angle and you will be pleased. Thanks James/ Lithonia

customer_reviews.title: Review on lens
customer_reviews.text: This lens was great. Wish it came sooner but no complaints in regards to the product! Good buy! Priced fairly, it's as much as it goes for right now.
customer_reviews.author: shireen

customer_reviews.title: Len's mounting threads were stripped and very noisy while recording ...
customer_reviews.text: Len's mounting threads were stripped and very noisy while recording. Unsuitable for shooting my youtube video's or anything Macro or telephoto. Lens's fall off because of stripped threads.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Harryman

customer_reviews.title: It was good when it worked
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in 2009 and by early 2012 the automatic focus stopped working. The lens was not used that often and having to replace it after 3 years is expensive and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Not the same piece shipped from Adorama
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for this lens and placed an Order through Amazon. It was being shipped by Adorama the actual seller of this product. Then, I notice the piece that is being shipped is a 'Refurbished' one, though there is no mention of that in the site when placing my order, or anywhere in the details of this item. When I call Adorama, the solution they offered was to just return it and get a credit for the amount paid. No, other solution or checking where the issue was in the first place. Anyone going for this item....make sure you check hat you are not getting a refurbished peice when expecting a new one.
customer_reviews.author: sigsome1

customer_reviews.title: buy the original
customer_reviews.text: the flex cable didn't last long, safe your money and buy the original, the picture quality seems to be degraded also.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Neiden

customer_reviews.title: Lens was great... but it didn't fit my camera
customer_reviews.text: The lens was very nice; however it didn't fit my 10d camera; so I had to return it. Refund was very prompt!
customer_reviews.author: C. Aldama

product_meta.title: Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Zoom Lens for Canon SLR Cameras
product_meta.description:
brand New lens in Bulk Packaging

In response to demands of photographers, this standard zoom lens is designed with Canon's Optical Image Stabilizer technology while retaining the compactness and lightness of previous models. Its stabilization allows sharp hand-held shots at shutter speeds up to four stops slower than otherwise possible. It consists of 11 elements in 9 groups and uses an Aspherical lens element to correct aberration for excellent image quality throughout the zoom range and a circular aperture for exquisite rendering of out-of-focus backgrounds. Without a lot of size, weight or cost, this lens expands picture-taking possibilities any time slow shutter speeds are needed.
feature_bullets: The standard zoom lens is designed with Canon's Optical Image Stabilizer technology while retaining the compactness and lightness of previous models.
It consists of 11 elements in 9 groups and uses an Aspherical lens element to correct aberration for excellent image quality
